title: Collaborative Online Learning Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design experience and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: An online collaborative instructional design competency development program for pre-service and in-service teachers in language education.

learning_goals: Educational participants can develop a collaborative design mindset for designing online language learning activities by collaborating with peer educators.
Educational participants can propose teacher development strategies utilizing at least three digital tools based on expansive learning theory.
Educational participants can provide design feedback from an ecological framework perspective at least twice on real language class cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
